features: 【3 Mode Bluetooth Wireless Mouse】This wireless gaming mouse adopts advanced 2.4G wireless and Bluetooth 5.0 transmission technology. Users can save 3 devices,fast response and easy switching.SM600 plus mouse compatible with your PC/Laptop/Macbook/Mobile Phones.

【3 Sided Honeycomb Shell design】More breathable, more sweat-absorbent and more comfortable!!!The gaming mouse is made of high quality ABS material and designed with ergonomic hollow perforated housing, Ergonomic Design reduce the weight and make the mouse more flexible and easier to be used for a long time without fatigue, and also enhance the heat dissipation features, very comfortable to use.

【14 RGB Rainbow Backlight】The white mouse has beautiful RGB led rainbow backlit.This Bluetooth wireless mouse is equipped with RGB lighting effects. can offer 6 kinds of chroma backlight Press the top button to switch the lighting mode, the lights can also be turned off, more cool and interesting especially when gaming in the dark.

【5 DPI Adjustable & Battery Rechargeable】This rechargeable gaming mouse can be adjusted within 5 levels dpi (4000-2400-1600-1200-800) by pressing the DPI button; Built-in 600Mah lithium battery, with USB-C charging cable, Low battery indicator will remind you to charge it with flashing red light. it also supported recharged while charging, not afraid of power off in gaming.

【Wide Compability Gaming Mouse】This wireless mouse is equipped with high quality switch, can be clicked up to 3 million times, can be used for PC, Mac Notebook, Laptop,Tablet, desktop, Computer, Cell Phone and other device, and support Windows 7/8/10/XP//VISTA/MAC OS/Android/ios, etc, The USB interface is plug and play, and the Bluetooth mode is fast and stable connection, which is very convenient and quick to use.
【About after-sales】 SOLAKAKA is committed to providing considerate after-sales service to every customer.We provide free returns and exchanges within one year.

【About Side button】The side button of the SM600 wireless Bluetooth mouse defaults to forward and backward. If the game or software does not support the forward and backward functions, it will not take effect. Some Mac system does not support the side button function.please update the system and set mouse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOLAKAKA SM600 PLUS Tir-mode White Gaming Mouse SM600 PLUS white wireless mouse gaming 5 DPI: (4000-2400-1600-1200-800),freely adjustable according to user needs!3 connection: 2 BT 5.1 and 2.4GHz wireless ,3 device save, switch fast and easy!600 rechargeable battery,support use while charging!14 RGB light,Includes rainbow colors and single color, switch freely for your need!

SM600 PLUS 3 Mode Connection Bluetooth Wireless Gaming Mouse Supports Bluetooth and 2.4GHz wireless. Users can connect up to 3 devices via two BT5.1 and one 2.4GHz wireless connection and switch among them easily with quick responses.Compatible with PC, laptop, MacBook, Xbox, mobile phone, and iPad.

Sleek, Portable Design 1. The ergonomic shape provides all-day comfort for your hand.2. The mouse's buttons and scroll wheel provide convenient control at your fingertips.3. This laser device offers high precision, accurate tracking, and fast responsiveness, making it suitable for use with graphic design software such as Photoshop, Coreldraw, Illustrator, nDesign, CAXA, CAD, and 3Ds Max. Lightweight Mouse for Gaming LightweightSweatproofBreathable Wide System Compatibility SM600 supports various operating systems, including Windows 7/8/10, XP, VISTA, MAC OS, Android, and iOS and more!

Q&A Q: Why don't the side buttons work? A: The SM600 does not support button customization, so the side buttons can only function for forward and backward . If the game or software does not support these functions, the side buttons will not work. We also offer the SM900, a wired gaming mouse that supports macro programming and customizable side buttons. Q: Why don't the side buttons work on a MAC system? A: The previous version of the Mac system is not compatible with the mouse's side button, resulting in the unavailability of the side button function. Please upgrade to the latest system. Q: What causes the battery to get damaged? A: SM600 does not currently support the fast charging function, so please use the official USB charging cable to charge. The use of fast charging or high-power charging heads will result in battery damage. Q: Why does it consume power quickly? A: When using the SM600, turning off the RGB lights will extend the battery life to 15-20 days. However, if the RGB lights are on constantly, the battery life will only be about 1-2 days. If the user wants to enjoy the RGB lights and avoid frequent charging, it is recommended to use the device while charging. Q: What could cause the cursor to suddenly become stuck or delayed? A: If the SM600 runs low on power, the cursor may experience delay or lag, a common issue for all wireless mice. Please charge the mouse promptly when experiencing delayed lag. The SM600 supports charging while in use. If delay persists after being fully charged, we will provide satisfactory after-sales service. Q: How do I turn off the lights? A: Toggle the switch at the bottom of the mouse to the "TURN ON" option. This will turn on the mouse while simultaneously turning off the lights.

SM600 PLUS Technical Specification Connection Mode 2.4GHz Wireless/BT1/BT2 DPI Range 4000-2400-1600-1200-800 Material PCB Battery Capacity 600mAh Mouse Size 124x70x41mm Mouse Weight 90g Buttons Left Button/Right Button/DPI Button/RGBButton/Wheel Button/Side Button Supports Systems Windows Xp/Win7/Win8/Win10/Win11/Vista/OS/IOS/Android Supports Devices PC/Laptop/Macbook/xbox/mobile phone/pad Packing Listing Mouse x1/Charging Cable x1/Receiver x1/Manual x1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son loves this mouse!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son to bring to school. He loves it. It works great. He says it hold a charge good. He says it’s super cool with the lights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clicky, Light, Ergonomic, Airy, USB-C
reviews.reviewText: Lighter than Corsair Gaming mouse. I like it in general.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandsons love it
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift my grandsons love this mouse works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse for the price. One caveat.
reviews.reviewText: Mouse arrived quickly and packaging was nicely minimal. Plug and play for me on Windows 11.Various connection modes are great for multi-device use. (I connect 2.4ghz with my pc, and bluetooth with my S20 FE that I hook up to my monitor for Samsung Dex.My only caveat is that the side buttons are very sensitive. Very easy to press Mouse 4 when reaching for Mouse 5. It's a bit of getting used to your thumb positioning. Normally you're able to rest your thumb on a side button without it pushing down. If the manufacturer is able to resolve that issue, this will be a 5 star mouse easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars it broke cuh vlone on top
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a mouse a couple of months ago, filled with excitement about its sleek design and promising features. At first, it worked like a charm - smooth scrolling, precise tracking, and comfortable grip. However, my satisfaction quickly turned into disappointment when, after only two months, it stopped responding when i clicked it. Only the light stayed on such a scam.The mouse's sudden malfunction left me feeling frustrated and inconvenienced. I tried troubleshooting by changing batteries and reconnecting it to my device, but nothing seemed to work. It became clear that the mouse had an underlying issue that couldn't be resolved on my end.What makes this situation even more disappointing is that I had high hopes for this mouse. I was drawn to its positive reviews and the brand's reputation for quality. Unfortunately, my experience didn't align with those reviews.In terms of build quality, the mouse felt sturdy and well-constructed initially. It had a solid weight to it and the buttons had a satisfying click. However, the longevity of the product fell short of expectations.As a consumer, I believe that a mouse, or any electronic device for that matter, should last longer than a couple of months before encountering issues. I rely on my mouse for work and leisure, so its failure significantly impacted my productivity and overall experience.In conclusion, while the mouse initially showed promise, its untimely breakdown greatly diminished my satisfaction. I hope that the manufacturer takes note of these issues and works towards improving the durability of their products. If you're considering purchasing this mouse, it may be wise to explore alternative options that have a reputation for long-lasting performance.

reviews.reviewText: Kid has enjoyed the mouse no problems here good buy

reviews.reviewTitle: Mucho más bonito y grande cómodo se muestra y buen precio.
reviews.reviewText: Lo adquiri por 3.30 US (65.55 mxn) ya con un cupon de 5 porciento y porque los colores me encantan mucho y luce femenino a mi gusto. Superó mis expectativas. Si es grande, el estampado se ve de calidad y no pixeleado (los colores son mucho más bonitos que en la foto). Lástima que aumento 2.5 dólares más pero aún así lo recomiendo mucho. También recomiendo este mouse que adquiri en Amazon que es inalambrico, ergonómico, recargable y brilla en la oscuridad.
Excelente impresión y muy cómodo para la muñeca
Me dura AL MENOS 5 Horas con las luces! No sé si dura más. Funciona bien! Ninguna queja.

reviews.reviewTitle: QUE LA CALIDAD NO CORRESPONDE AL PRECIO.
reviews.reviewText: NO ES LO QUE ESPERABA, SU CALIDAD ES MUY DEFICIENTE, EL COJIN NADA COMODO, POR EL PRECIO ESPERABA MEJOR CALIDAD DE LOS MATERIALES Y DE IMPRESIÓN, ESTA POR DEBAJO DE SU COSTO.
